data.title: Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker's relationship timeline
data.meta_description: Travis Barker and Kourtney Kardashian were family friends for years before their wedding in May 2022 and they've since gone on to welcome a baby son together
data.text:
Kourtney Kardashian shocked fans when she announced she was dating rockstar Travis Barker, but the pair had actually been friends for years before their romance.

The pair lived in the same gated community in Calabasas, California, and Travis even made an appearance on Keeping Up With The Kardashians alongside his ex-wife Shanna Moakler. In more recent years, Kourtney and Travis had been seen grabbing dinner and even attending church together.

After a whirlwind romance, Travis proposed to Kourtney and they tied the knot in a stunning Italian wedding. However, things haven't always been easy for the couple and they've been very open about their negative experience with IVF. Here, we've taken a look back at Kourtney and Travis' romance.

September 2018: Romance rumors start

READ MORE: Kim and Kourtney Kardashian dramas explained from physical fight to wedding feud

Kourtney and Travis first sparked romance rumors in September 2018 when they were seen leaving a vegan restaurant together in Los Angeles. Just days later, the pair were seen attending Hillsong's evening church service together.

A month later, Kourtney and Travis joined together as they went for dinner with Larsa Pippen at Crossroads restaurant in LA. At the time, neither spoke about their relationship.

January 2021: Making it official

After being friends for years, Kourtney and Travis went public with their relationship in January 2021. They both shared pictures from their time spent together in Kris Jenner’s Palm Springs vacation home before a source told People: "They've been dating for about a month or two. Travis has liked her for a while."

A month later, Kourtney and Travis went Instagram official after spending Valentine's Day together. The couple both posted a sweet snap of them holding hands in a car to confirm their romance.

April 2021: Family vacation and birthday celebrations

Kourtney and Travis took their relationship to the next stage in April 2021 as they enjoyed a holiday with their families in Deer Valley, Utah. The trip allowed the couple to give their kids a chance to get to know each other.

That same month, Travis showed off his love for Kourtney as he got her name tattooed on his chest. He also made sure to treat his girlfriend as she celebrated her 42nd birthday.

The Blink-182 drummer sent Kourtney a giant floral display as a birthday gift and shared a gushing tribute to her on social media. "YOU’RE A BLESSING TO THIS WORLD. HAPPY BIRTHDAY," Travis wrote.

August 2021: Travis' first flight in years

Join the Mirror's SMS news service to get the biggest breaking stories delivered straight to your phone. Click here to subscribe.

In August 2021, Kourtney supported Travis as he took his first flight since he was involved in a fatal crash in 2008 while traveling to Mexico. The harrowing incident killed four people and left Travis with third-degree burns on more than half of his body.

When he took an airplane ride with Kourtney, he shared the experience on Instagram, writing: "With you anything is possible." A source added to People at the time: "It's a huge deal that Travis flew to Cabo.

"The plane crash many years ago was extremely traumatizing. He has needed a lot of help to get to this point. Kourtney has been very supportive."

Travis also spoke about the experience in an interview with NYLON. He said: "I made a deal with her that she had just said to me, 'I would love to do so much traveling with you. I want to go to Italy with you. I want to go to Cabo with you. I want to go to Paris with you. I want to go to Bora Bora with you'.

"And I said, 'Well, when the day comes you want to fly, I'm telling you I'll do it with you. I would do anything with you. And just give me 24 hours notice'. And that's what she did."

September 2021: Red carpet debut

Kourtney and Travis had posted plenty of snaps of their romance by September 2021, but it wasn't until then that they made their red carpet debut. The pair joined forces for the MTV Video Music Awards.

The pair wore matching black outfits, with Kourtney looking incredible in a tiny leather mini dress and Travis wearing a suit jacket and no shirt. They shared plenty of kisses on the red carpet as they posed for the cameras.

October 2021: Engagement

Travis and Kourtney took their relationship to the next stage in October 2021 as the Blink-182 musician got down on one knee. He planned the perfect proposal for Kourtney on the beach at the Rosewood Miramar in Santa Barbara, California.

Kourtney announced the happy news on Instagram as she wrote: "Forever." Travis designed Kourtney's engagement ring with the help of jewelry designer Lorraine Schwartz.

April 2022: Las Vegas wedding

Click here to follow the Mirror US on Google News to stay up to date with all the latest news, sport and entertainment stories.

Kourtney and Travis made a loved-up appearance at the 2022 Grammy Awards, after which they had an unofficial wedding at the One Love Wedding Chapel in Las Vegas. Kourtney later admitted they didn't have a marriage license for the wedding.

An Elvis Presley impersonator officiated the wedding, which took place at 1:45 am and lasted about 30 minutes. Kourtney opened up about the ceremony during an episode of The Kardashians and admitted she had been "blackout" drunk.

"I didn't even remember Elvis sang to me walking down the aisle. I didn't remember I had a bouquet," she said. Kourtney added: "I did throw up after, though, and took my top off and unbuttoned my pants and had to walk back through the hotel with a million people taking my photo. I was a hot slob kebab."

April 2022: Wedding planning

At the end of April 2022, Kourtney and Travis headed to Italy for a trip to start planning their wedding. "Kourtney and Travis had a wonderful trip to Italy. Their first stop in Milan was wedding-related," a source told People at the time.

May 2022: Legal wedding

Travis and Kourtney legally got married in Santa Barbara on May 15, 2022. They were seen in a black convertible with a "Just Married" sign after exchanging vows.

Shortly after, the two exchanged vows for the third time in front of their friends and family in Portofino, Italy. The celebrations lasted for several days, starting with a dinner party at Ristorante Puny.

The next day, they visited the Abbey of San Fruttuoso for a special lunch and guests then enjoyed dinner and dancing late into the night at Villa San Bartolomeo. The wedding took place on May 22.

September 2022: IVF struggles

In September 2022, Kourtney revealed she and Travis had taken a break from IVF. Speaking to the cameras in an episode of The Kardashians, Kourtney said: "After eight months of our IVF journey, we took a break and wanted to try things naturally. The doctors had told us that we still have some really good-looking follicles and that it was the best they've seen."

She added: "Everyone involved, including our natural doctors, felt we should give it one more shot with an IVF retrieval. And so we did one final egg retrieval and we are just waiting on the genetic testing results, but it has made it to an embryo."

June 2023: Pregnancy announcement

After years of trying, Kourtney announced her pregnancy at a Blink-182 concert. The reality star shared the news at a Blink-182 concert in Los Angeles by holding up a sign which said: "Travis I'm pregnant."

Kourtney's pregnancy reveal was a throwback to Blink-182's All The Small Things music video. After seeing the sign, Travis rushed off stage to embrace his wife.

September 2023: Kourtney is hospitalized

Travis shocked fans when he canceled some of his shows with Blink-182 for an "urgent family matter". It was later confirmed Kourtney had been rushed to the hospital.

Kourtney later took to hospital to share what had happened, revealing she had experienced a terrifying pregnancy complication. She wrote: "As someone who has had three really easy pregnancies in the past, I wasn’t prepared for the fear of rushing into urgent fetal surgery.

"I have a whole new understanding and respect for the mamas who have had to fight for their babies while pregnant. Walking out of the hospital with my baby boy in my tummy and safe was the truest blessing."

November 2023: Birth of Rocky

On November 1, 2023, Kourtney gave birth to her and Travis' son. It was later revealed they had named the baby Rocky Thirteen Barker.

"Kourtney is over the moon about her son’s arrival. Her pregnancy took a stressful turn towards the end. She is happy to be able to snuggle her baby boy now. She feels so blessed," a source said at the time.
